Room.Name: Marina Way
Room.ShortDescription: Marina Way continues to the north and south. An alley is to the east.
Room.LongDescription: On the west side of the street is the Leviathan Small Boat Rental offfice. Many people in the city of Oceancrest believe the business is just a front for a gang of retired pirates, now in the smuggling trade, but since they always pay their taxes and goods can be purchased in there for a fraction of their true costs, no one ever complains. Small shops are to the east.
